extendedInfo.description: Achievement checklist for Test Drive Ferrari Racing Legends on the Xbox 360, to keep track of your progress towards 1000 gamer points.. All 45 Achievements included.. Descriptions for all 45 Achievements. Your achievement progress is automatically saved when a checkbox is pressed.. Your achievement progress is automatically loaded when you relaunch the application. The Achievement description is shown when a row is pressedDisclaimerThis is an unofficial educational guide created by Dev4WebApps. All trademarks and copyrights referenced are the property of their respective owners and are used under the fair use doctrine. Dev4WebApps and this application are in no way affiliated with Eden Games or Atari.
